## MountFn type

Mount function type - returned by mount(...modules)

**Signature:**

```typescript
type MountFn<TSvc> = <TElement>(container: Element, component: PortableComponent<TSvc, TElement>) => () => void;
```
**References:** [PortableComponent](../portablecomponent/)
